00020 struct HairpinSegment {
00021       QPointF p1;          // user draggable startpoint
00022       QPointF p2;          // user draggable endpoint
00023       QRectF bbox;
00024       };

00026 //---------------------------------------------------------
00027 //   Hairpin
00028 //
00029 //    p2 - endpoint
00030 //---------------------------------------------------------
00031 
00032 class Hairpin : public Element {
00033       int _tick1, _tick2;
00034       bool flip;        // false=crescendo  true=decrescendo
00035 
00036       QPointF off1, off2;   // user offset (in spatium units)
00037       QRectF r1, r2;      // "grips" for p1, p2
00038 
00039       pstl::plist<HairpinSegment*> segments;
00040       int mode;
00041       enum { NORMAL, DRAG1, DRAG2 };
00042 
00043       void bboxUpdate();
00044 //      void layout2(Score*);
00045 
00046    public:
00047       Hairpin(Score*);
00048       Hairpin(const Hairpin&);
00049       virtual Hairpin* clone() const { return new Hairpin(*this); }
00050 
00051       void setLen(double);
00052       void setFlip(bool f);
00053 
00054       void setTick1(int t) { _tick1 = t; }
00055       void setTick2(int t) { _tick2 = t; }
00056       int tick1() const    { return _tick1; }
00057       int tick2() const    { return _tick2; }
00058 
00059       virtual bool contains(const QPointF& p) const;
00060       virtual QPointF  dragOff() const;
00061       virtual void draw1(Painter&) const;
00062       virtual bool startDrag(const QPointF&) { return true; }
00063       virtual void endDrag();
00064       virtual bool startEdit();
00065       virtual bool editStartDrag(const QPointF&);
00066       virtual bool editEndDrag();
00067       virtual bool editDrag(QPointF*, const QPointF&);
00068       virtual void endEdit();
00069       virtual bool edit(QKeyEvent*);
00070       virtual void layout(Score* sc);
00071 
00072       virtual void write(Xml& xml) const;
00073       virtual void read(QDomNode);
00074       };
